author: cms-tau-pog
body:
This PR is created in order to integrate in cms-data files needed to perform the tau-tag at HLT L2 with a CNN (in the saved model in the L2TauNNTag folder).
In the L2TauNNTag folder there is also a json dictionary, which is needed to normalise the matrix used to feed the CNN.

This PR is related to cms-sw/cmssw#35640.
title: Training files for CNN-based L2 TauId
